title: SettingChatGPT
msg:
i use api openAi with the model text-davinci-003 what is the best setting Frequency Presence Temperature and TopP for software enginer chatGpt: 
The best settings for software engineering using the OpenAI model text-davinci-003 would depend on the specific application. Generally, it is recommended to use a Frequency setting of 0.5, Presence setting of 0.8, Temperature setting of 0.7 and TopP setting of 0.9 for best results. and about the setting MaxToken  and BeamSize, it is recommended to use MaxToken of 100 and BeamSize of 4.
